    • Uses of IndicesRequest in org.elasticsearch.action

      Subinterfaces of IndicesRequest in org.elasticsearch.action 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  AliasesRequest
      Needs to be implemented by all ActionRequest subclasses that relate to one or more indices and one or more aliases.
      interface  DocumentRequest<T>
      Generic interface to group ActionRequest, which work on single document level Forces this class return index/type/id getters
      static interface  IndicesRequest.Replaceable 
      Classes in org.elasticsearch.action that implement IndicesRequest 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OriginalIndices
      Used to keep track of original indices within internal (e.g.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the subrequests that a composite request is composed of

    • Uses of IndicesRequest in org.elasticsearch.cluster.metadata

      Methods in org.elasticsearch.cluster.metadata with parameters of type IndicesRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String[] IndexNameExpressionResolver.concreteIndices(ClusterState state, IndicesRequest request)
      Same as IndexNameExpressionResolver.concreteIndices(ClusterState, IndicesOptions, String...), but the index expressions and options are encapsulated in the specified request.
      String IndexNameExpressionResolver.concreteSingleIndex(ClusterState state, IndicesRequest request)
      Utility method that allows to resolve an index expression to its corresponding single concrete index.
